div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 461 Ramna, 20 km. NW of Resita, Ru- mania, 1896 Burial: 3rd cent. B.C. (Mitrea) Contents: 114 AR Philip II, Alexander III: "some" tetradr. Imit. Philip III: tetradr. (bulk of the hd.) Disposition: Budapest 10; Timisoara 6 † Berkeszi, TRÉ 23 (1907), p. 35, no. 2 Gohl, NK 1907, pp. 1-4
